1.question: What do we do when it rains?

4.question: How do we clean our hands?

5.question: What happens if you drop this?

8.question: What do we wear when it snows?

9.question: What does a baby do when it is hungry?

fiveWOneH.instructions: Tap an object to choose a category

q_who_to_when_sick.question: Who do we go to when we are sick?
q_who_to_when_sick.correct: Yes! We go to the doctor when we are sick.
q_who_to_when_sick.wrong: No, when we are sick we go to the doctor.

q_who_to_when_fire.question: Who do we call when there's a fire?
q_who_to_when_fire.correct: Correct! We call the fire department when there's a fire.
q_who_to_when_fire.wrong: No, we should call the fire department when there is a fire.

q_who_teaches_at_school.question: Who teaches us at school?
q_who_teaches_at_school.correct: Correct! The teacher teaches the lessons.
q_who_teaches_at_school.wrong: No, the teacher teaches at school.

q_who_brings_letter.question: Who brings letters?
q_who_brings_letter.correct: Correct! The mail carrier brings letters.
q_who_brings_letter.wrong: No, the mail carrier brings letters.

q_who_flies_plane.question: Who operates the airplane?
q_who_flies_plane.correct: Yes! The pilot flies the airplane.
q_who_flies_plane.wrong: No, the pilot flies the airplane.

q_who_cuts_hair.question: Who do we go to to get our hair cut?
q_who_cuts_hair.correct: Correct! A hairdresser (or barber) cuts hair.

q_who_cooks_food.question: Who cooks the food?
q_who_cooks_food.correct: Yes! The chef cooks the food.
q_who_cooks_food.wrong: No, the chef cooks the food.

q_who_provides_milk.question: Which animal gives milk?
q_who_provides_milk.wrong: No, milk usually comes from cows.

q_who_reads_bedtime_stories.question: Who reads us bedtime stories at night?
q_who_reads_bedtime_stories.correct: Yes! Our mom or dad reads us stories.
q_who_reads_bedtime_stories.wrong: No, usually our mom or dad reads to us.

q_who_do_we_play_with.question: Who do we play with?
q_who_do_we_play_with.correct: Yes! We play with our friend.
q_who_do_we_play_with.wrong: No, we usually play with friends.

q_who_is_sad_about_broken_toy.question: Who is sad because their toy is broken?
q_who_is_sad_about_broken_toy.correct: Yes! The child is sad because their toy is broken.
q_who_is_sad_about_broken_toy.wrong: No, the child with the broken toy is sad.

q_who_is_happy_to_see_food.question: Who is happy to see their food?
q_who_is_happy_to_see_food.correct: Yes! A hungry baby is happy to see food.
q_who_is_happy_to_see_food.wrong: No, a hungry baby is happy.

q_who_is_playing_with_ball.question: Who is playing with the ball?
q_who_is_playing_with_ball.correct: Yes! The child is playing with the ball.
q_who_is_playing_with_ball.wrong: No, the child is playing with the ball.

q_who_is_driving_car.question: Who is driving the car?
q_who_is_driving_car.correct: Yes! Dad is driving the car.
q_who_is_driving_car.wrong: No, the person driving is called the driver.

q_who_plows_field_and_grows_vegetables.question: Who plows the field and grows vegetables and fruits?
q_who_plows_field_and_grows_vegetables.correct: Yes! A farmer plows the field and grows crops.
q_who_plows_field_and_grows_vegetables.wrong: No, a farmer does that job.

q_who_goes_to_space_in_rocket.question: Who goes to space in a rocket?
q_who_goes_to_space_in_rocket.correct: Yes! An astronaut goes to space.
q_who_goes_to_space_in_rocket.wrong: No, an astronaut goes to space.

q_who_wears_crown_and_lives_in_palace.question: Who wears a crown and lives in a palace in stories?
q_who_wears_crown_and_lives_in_palace.correct: Yes! A king lives in a palace and wears a crown.
q_who_wears_crown_and_lives_in_palace.wrong: No, that person is a king.

q_who_gives_first_aid.question: Who gives first aid to someone who is injured?
q_who_gives_first_aid.correct: Yes! A nurse or doctor provides first aid.
q_who_gives_first_aid.wrong: No, medical staff provide first aid.

q_who_studies_and_learns_at_school.question: Who studies and learns new things at school?
q_who_studies_and_learns_at_school.correct: Yes! A student learns new things at school.
q_who_studies_and_learns_at_school.wrong: No, the person who learns at school is a student.

q_what_brush_teeth_with.question: What do we brush our teeth with?
q_what_brush_teeth_with.correct: Yes! We brush our teeth with toothpaste and a brush.
q_what_brush_teeth_with.wrong: No, we use toothpaste to brush our teeth.

q_what_use_for_soup.question: What do we use to eat soup?
q_what_use_for_soup.correct: Correct! We use a spoon to eat soup.
q_what_use_for_soup.wrong: No, we use a spoon to eat soup.

q_what_erase_with.question: What do we erase mistakes with?
q_what_erase_with.correct: Yes! We erase mistakes with an eraser.
q_what_erase_with.wrong: No, we use an eraser to erase.

q_what_dry_after_bath.question: What do we use to dry ourselves after a bath?
q_what_dry_after_bath.correct: Correct! We dry ourselves with a towel after a bath.
q_what_dry_after_bath.wrong: No, we use a towel to dry off.

q_what_chickens_give_us_for_breakfast.question: What do chickens give us that we eat at breakfast?

q_what_wash_hands_with.question: What do we wash our hands with?
q_what_wash_hands_with.correct: Yes! We wash our hands with soap and water.
q_what_wash_hands_with.wrong: No, we wash our hands with soap.

q_what_use_to_paint.question: What do we use to paint pictures?
q_what_use_to_paint.correct: Yes! We use paint and a brush to paint.
q_what_use_to_paint.wrong: No, we use paint to make pictures.

q_what_use_to_tie_hair.question: What do we use to tie our hair?
q_what_use_to_tie_hair.correct: Yes! We use a hair clip or hair tie.
q_what_use_to_tie_hair.wrong: No, we use a hair tie.

q_what_put_under_head_when_sleeping.question: What do we put under our head when sleeping?
q_what_put_under_head_when_sleeping.correct: Yes! We put a pillow under our head.
q_what_put_under_head_when_sleeping.wrong: No, we use a pillow when we sleep.

q_what_wear_on_feet_when_going_out.question: What do we wear on our feet when going outside?
q_what_wear_on_feet_when_going_out.wrong: No, we wear shoes when we go out.

q_what_people_who_cant_see_far_wear.question: What do people who can't see far wear?
q_what_people_who_cant_see_far_wear.wrong: No, they wear glasses to see better.

q_what_put_on_birthday_cake_and_blow.question: What do we put on a birthday cake and blow out?
q_what_put_on_birthday_cake_and_blow.correct: Yes! We put candles and blow them out.
q_what_put_on_birthday_cake_and_blow.wrong: No, we put candles on the cake.

q_what_squeeze_on_salad_for_sour_taste.question: What do we squeeze on a salad to make it sour?
q_what_squeeze_on_salad_for_sour_taste.wrong: No, we squeeze lemon on salad.

q_what_use_to_hammer_nail_on_wall.question: What do we use to hammer a nail into the wall?
q_what_use_to_hammer_nail_on_wall.wrong: No, we use a hammer to hammer nails.

q_what_burn_to_get_warm.question: What do we burn to get warm?
q_what_burn_to_get_warm.correct: Yes! We burn wood to stay warm.
q_what_burn_to_get_warm.wrong: No, we burn wood to get warm.

q_what_put_stuff_in_when_going_to_school.question: What do we put our things in when going to school?
q_what_put_stuff_in_when_going_to_school.correct: Yes! We put them in a school bag.
q_what_put_stuff_in_when_going_to_school.wrong: No, we put our items in a bag.

q_what_is_crispy_snack_made_of_potatoes.question: What is the crispy snack made from potatoes called?

q_what_drink_water_with.question: What do we drink water with?
q_what_drink_water_with.correct: Yes! We drink water from a glass.
q_what_drink_water_with.wrong: No, we use a glass to drink water.

q_what_stick_on_letter_to_mail.question: What do we stick on a letter to mail it?
q_what_stick_on_letter_to_mail.wrong: No, we put a stamp on the letter.

q_what_babies_drink_milk_with.question: What do babies drink milk with?
q_what_babies_drink_milk_with.correct: Yes! Babies drink milk with a bottle.

q_what_use_to_fix_messy_hair.question: What do we use to fix messy hair?
q_what_use_to_fix_messy_hair.correct: Yes! A comb fixes messy hair.
q_what_use_to_fix_messy_hair.wrong: No, we comb our hair with a comb.

q_what_spread_on_bread_for_breakfast.question: What do we spread on bread for breakfast?
q_what_spread_on_bread_for_breakfast.correct: Yes! We spread butter or jam.
q_what_spread_on_bread_for_breakfast.wrong: No, we can spread butter on bread.

q_where_doctors_work.question: Where do doctors work?
q_where_doctors_work.correct: Yes! Doctors work in a hospital.

q_where_go_to_swing.question: Where do we go to swing?
q_where_go_to_swing.correct: Yes! We go to the park.
q_where_go_to_swing.wrong: No, we go to the park to swing.

q_where_sleep_at_night.question: Where do we sleep at night?
q_where_sleep_at_night.correct: Yes! We sleep in our bed.

q_where_fish_live.question: Where do fish live?
q_where_fish_live.correct: Yes! Fish live in water (sea, lake, aquarium).

q_where_planes_fly.question: Where do airplanes fly?
q_where_planes_fly.correct: Yes! Airplanes fly in the sky.
q_where_planes_fly.wrong: No, airplanes fly in the sky.

q_where_ships_sail.question: Where do ships sail?
q_where_ships_sail.correct: Yes! Ships sail on the sea.
q_where_ships_sail.wrong: No, ships go on the sea.

q_where_cars_go.question: Where do cars go?
q_where_cars_go.correct: Yes! Cars go on the road.
q_where_cars_go.wrong: No, cars are used on roads.

q_where_eat_out_with_family.question: Where do we eat out with our family?
q_where_eat_out_with_family.correct: Yes! We can eat at a restaurant.
q_where_eat_out_with_family.wrong: No, we go to a restaurant to eat out.

q_where_buy_food_for_home.question: Where do we buy food for home?
q_where_buy_food_for_home.correct: Yes! We buy it at the market or grocery store.
q_where_buy_food_for_home.wrong: No, we do food shopping at a market.

q_where_is_place_with_lots_of_books.question: Where is the place with lots of books?
q_where_is_place_with_lots_of_books.wrong: No, that place is the library.

q_where_camels_usually_live.question: Where do camels usually live?
q_where_camels_usually_live.correct: Yes! Camels live in the desert.

q_where_bears_usually_live.question: Where do bears usually live?
q_where_bears_usually_live.correct: Yes! Bears live in the forest.
q_where_bears_usually_live.wrong: No, bears live in the forest.

q_where_put_clean_clothes.question: Where do we put our clean clothes?
q_where_put_clean_clothes.correct: Yes! We put them in the wardrobe.
q_where_put_clean_clothes.wrong: No, clean clothes go in the wardrobe.

q_where_go_to_sunbathe_and_swim_in_summe.question: Where do we go in summer to sunbathe and swim?
q_where_go_to_sunbathe_and_swim_in_summe.correct: Yes! We go to the beach or pool.
q_where_go_to_sunbathe_and_swim_in_summe.wrong: No, we go to the beach in summer.

q_where_birds_lay_eggs.question: Where do birds lay their eggs?
q_where_birds_lay_eggs.correct: Yes! They lay them in their nests.
q_where_birds_lay_eggs.wrong: No, birds lay eggs in their nests.

q_where_cook_cooks.question: Where does the cook prepare food?
q_where_cook_cooks.correct: Yes! The cook prepares food in the kitchen.
q_where_cook_cooks.wrong: No, cooks work in the kitchen.

q_where_set_up_tent_for_camping.question: Where do we set up our tent for camping?
q_where_set_up_tent_for_camping.correct: Yes! We set it up in the forest or a campsite.
q_where_set_up_tent_for_camping.wrong: No, we can go to the forest to camp.

q_when_use_umbrella.question: When do we use an umbrella?
q_when_use_umbrella.correct: Yes! We use it when it rains.
q_when_use_umbrella.wrong: No, we use an umbrella in the rain.

q_when_make_snowman.question: When do we make a snowman?
q_when_make_snowman.correct: Correct! When it snows, we make a snowman.
q_when_make_snowman.wrong: No, you need snow to make a snowman.

q_when_see_owls.question: When do we usually see owls?
q_when_see_owls.correct: Correct! We see owls at night.
q_when_see_owls.wrong: No, owls are active at night.

q_when_see_stars_in_sky.question: When do we see stars in the sky?
q_when_see_stars_in_sky.correct: Yes! We see them at night.

q_when_roosters_crow.question: When do roosters usually crow?
q_when_roosters_crow.correct: Yes! They crow in the morning.
q_when_roosters_crow.wrong: No, roosters crow in the morning.

q_when_wear_beanie_when_cold.question: When do we wear a beanie?
q_when_wear_beanie_when_cold.correct: Correct! We wear it when it's cold or in winter.
q_when_wear_beanie_when_cold.wrong: No, we wear a beanie in cold weather.

q_when_usually_go_to_beach.question: When do we usually go to the beach?
q_when_usually_go_to_beach.correct: Yes! In summer or when the weather is sunny.
q_when_usually_go_to_beach.wrong: No, we usually go to the beach in summer.

q_when_blow_out_candles_on_cake.question: When do we blow out the candles on a cake?
q_when_blow_out_candles_on_cake.correct: Yes! We blow them out on our birthday.
q_when_blow_out_candles_on_cake.wrong: No, we blow the candles on the birthday.

q_when_eat.question: When do we eat food?
q_when_eat.correct: Yes! We eat when we are hungry.
q_when_eat.wrong: No, we eat when we are hungry.

q_when_sleep.question: When do we sleep?
q_when_sleep.correct: Yes! We sleep when we feel sleepy or tired.
q_when_sleep.wrong: No, usually we sleep at night.

q_when_usually_go_to_bed.question: When do we usually go to bed?
q_when_usually_go_to_bed.correct: Yes! We go to bed at night.
q_when_usually_go_to_bed.wrong: No, we go to bed at night to sleep.

q_when_see_sun_in_sky.question: When do we see the sun in the sky?
q_when_see_sun_in_sky.correct: Yes! We see it during the day.
q_when_see_sun_in_sky.wrong: No, we see the sun during the day.

q_when_turn_on_light_in_room.question: When do we turn on the room light?
q_when_turn_on_light_in_room.correct: Yes! We turn it on when it gets dark.
q_when_turn_on_light_in_room.wrong: No, we turn on the light when it's dark.

q_when_wear_gloves_when_hands_cold.question: When do we wear gloves if our hands are cold?
q_when_wear_gloves_when_hands_cold.correct: Yes! We wear them in winter or when it's cold.
q_when_wear_gloves_when_hands_cold.wrong: No, we wear gloves when it's cold.

q_when_usually_wear_shorts.question: When do we usually wear shorts?
q_when_usually_wear_shorts.correct: Yes! We wear shorts in summer or when it's warm.
q_when_usually_wear_shorts.wrong: No, we wear shorts in warm weather.

q_when_wash_hands.question: When do we wash our hands?
q_when_wash_hands.correct: Yes! We wash them when they get dirty or before eating.
q_when_wash_hands.wrong: No, we wash our hands when they're dirty.

q_why_ice_cream_melted.question: Why did the ice cream melt?
q_why_ice_cream_melted.correct: Yes! It melted because it was kept in the heat.
q_why_ice_cream_melted.wrong: No, heat melts the ice cream.

q_why_hair_is_wet.question: Why is this hair wet?
q_why_hair_is_wet.correct: Yes! It is wet because they took a shower or got wet.
q_why_hair_is_wet.wrong: No, the hair is wet because it touched water.

q_why_child_is_cold.question: Why is the child cold?
q_why_child_is_cold.correct: Yes! They are cold because the weather is cold.
q_why_child_is_cold.wrong: No, cold weather makes us feel cold.

q_why_child_is_crying.question: Why is this child crying?
q_why_child_is_crying.correct: Yes! They may be crying because they are hurt or sad.
q_why_child_is_crying.wrong: No, they might be sad or hurt.

q_why_child_holds_umbrella.question: Why is the child holding an umbrella?
q_why_child_holds_umbrella.correct: Yes! To protect from the rain.
q_why_child_holds_umbrella.wrong: No, they hold an umbrella because it's raining.

q_why_wrinkled_clothes_became_smooth.question: How did the wrinkled clothes become smooth?

q_why_hands_get_dirty.question: Why do our hands get dirty?
q_why_hands_get_dirty.correct: Yes! They get dirty when we touch something dirty.
q_why_hands_get_dirty.wrong: No, playing can make our hands dirty.

q_why_child_is_tired.question: Why is this child tired?
q_why_child_is_tired.correct: Yes! They might be tired because they played a lot.
q_why_child_is_tired.wrong: No, doing something tiring can make them tired.

q_why_child_is_lying_down.question: Why is this child lying down?
q_why_child_is_lying_down.correct: Yes! They may be lying down because they are sick or tired.

q_why_vase_is_broken.question: Why is the vase broken?
q_why_vase_is_broken.correct: Yes! It may have fallen to the floor.
q_why_vase_is_broken.wrong: No, it broke because of a hard hit.

q_why_room_is_bright.question: Why is the room bright?
q_why_room_is_bright.correct: Yes! Because the light is on.
q_why_room_is_bright.wrong: No, the lamp lights the room.

q_why_floor_is_wet.question: Why is the floor wet?
q_why_floor_is_wet.wrong: No, the floor is wet because water spilled.

q_why_room_is_dark.question: Why is the room dark?
q_why_room_is_dark.correct: Yes! Because the light is off or it is night.
q_why_room_is_dark.wrong: No, it is dark because there is no light.

q_why_child_is_happy.question: Why is the child happy?
q_why_child_is_happy.correct: Yes! They are happy because they got a gift or did something they like.
q_why_child_is_happy.wrong: No, they are happy because they have something they want.

q_why_dirty_dishes_are_clean.question: How did the dirty dishes become clean?
q_why_dirty_dishes_are_clean.wrong: No, dishes are cleaned by washing.

q_why_some_people_wear_glasses.question: Why do some people wear glasses?
q_why_some_people_wear_glasses.correct: Yes! They wear them to see better.
q_why_some_people_wear_glasses.wrong: No, they wear glasses because their eyesight is not good.

q_how_go_to_school.question: How do we go to school?
q_how_go_to_school.correct: Yes! We go by bus, car, or by walking.
q_how_go_to_school.wrong: No, usually we go to school by bus.

q_how_open_door.question: How do we open the door?
q_how_open_door.correct: Yes! With a key or by using the doorknob.
q_how_open_door.wrong: No, we use a key to open the door.

q_how_reach_high_place.question: How do we reach a high place?
q_how_reach_high_place.correct: Yes! By using a ladder or a chair.
q_how_reach_high_place.wrong: No, we reach high places with a ladder.

q_how_travel_at_sea.question: How do we travel on the sea?
q_how_travel_at_sea.correct: Correct! We travel by ship or ferry.
q_how_travel_at_sea.wrong: No, we go by ship on the sea.

q_how_clean_room.question: How do we clean the room?
q_how_clean_room.correct: Yes! By using a vacuum or a cloth.
q_how_clean_room.wrong: No, we clean the room with cleaning tools.

q_how_dry_hands_after_washing.question: How do we dry our hands after washing?
q_how_dry_hands_after_washing.correct: Yes! We dry them with a towel.
q_how_dry_hands_after_washing.wrong: No, we dry our hands with a towel.

q_how_eat_pasta.question: How do we eat pasta?
q_how_eat_pasta.correct: Yes! We eat it with a fork.
q_how_eat_pasta.wrong: No, we eat pasta with a fork.

q_how_comb_hair.question: How do we comb our hair?
q_how_comb_hair.correct: Yes! We comb with a comb.
q_how_comb_hair.wrong: No, we use a comb to comb our hair.

q_how_cut_paper.question: How do we cut paper?
q_how_cut_paper.correct: Yes! We cut it with scissors.
q_how_cut_paper.wrong: No, we use scissors to cut paper.

q_how_measure_height.question: How do we measure our height?
q_how_measure_height.correct: Yes! We use a tape measure or ruler.
q_how_measure_height.wrong: No, we use a tape measure to measure height.

q_how_talk_to_someone_far_away.question: How do we talk to someone far away?
q_how_talk_to_someone_far_away.correct: Yes! We talk on the phone.
q_how_talk_to_someone_far_away.wrong: No, we use a phone to speak to someone far away.

q_how_light_a_dark_room.question: How do we light up a dark room?
q_how_light_a_dark_room.correct: Yes! We turn on the light.
q_how_light_a_dark_room.wrong: No, we light the room by switching on the lamp.

q_how_cook_food.question: How do we cook food?
q_how_cook_food.correct: Yes! We cook on the stove or in the oven.
q_how_cook_food.wrong: No, we cook food in the oven or on the stove.

lineTracing.title: Line Tracing
lineTracing.subtitle: Follow the path with your finger

puzzle.title: Simple Puzzle
puzzle.subtitle: Drag pieces to complete the picture

relativeComparison.title: Relative Comparison
relativeComparison.instruction: Compare the two revealed cards and answer the question.

lineTracing.instruction: Trace the line with your finger. Try to stay on the line!

rhythmFollowing.instruction: Watch the rhythm first, then tap the same way to repeat it.

objectCollector.title: Object Collector
objectCollector.subtitle: Collect the correct items into the basket
objectCollector.instructions: Use arrow keys or your finger to move the basket

emotionPuppet.title: Emotion Puppet
emotionPuppet.subtitle: Create emotions by combining face parts
